title: Ryder Cup Gala 2014
headline: Ryder Cup Gala 2014
description: Players, captains and significant others suited up for the traditional Ryder Cup Gala Dinner and Concert in Auchterarder, Scotland to kick off the tournament's festivities.
body: Players, captains and significant others suited up for the traditional Ryder Cup Gala Dinner and Concert in Auchterarder, Scotland to kick off the tournament's festivities.
